comments: Thompson (HOU) briefly places his forearm to Haliburton's (IND) body at the start of the drive, which he is able to move through.
Thompson (HOU) moves along Haliburton's (IND) path before cleanly blocking his driving shot attempt as the body contact that occurs is marginal.
The ball deflects off Haliburton's (IND) body as he is standing out of bounds. Possession is correctly awarded to HOU.
Thompson (HOU) establishes himself in Nembhard's (IND) path and is firming up when he absorbs the incoming contact during the pick.
Turner (IND) reaches in and initiates contact to Green's (HOU) head during the drive.
Green (HOU) gathers the ball and takes three steps before starting his dribble.
Turner (IND) initiates contact with Sengun's (HOU) arm during his upward shooting motion that affects his driving shot attempt.
Thompson (HOU) reaches in and makes slight contact to Nembhard's (IND) lower body during the dribble, which is marginal.
Thompson (HOU) reaches in and makes contact with the ball, causing it to deflect off of Nembhard's (IND) hand.  Nembhard should have been allowed to recover the loose ball in the backcourt.
Sengun (HOU) establishes himself in Nembhard's (IND) path and absorbs the incoming contact during the pick.
Smith (IND) briefly places his hand to Green's (HOU) body during the drive, which he immediately removes as the contact that occurs is marginal.
Smith (IND jumps alongside Green (HOU) and cleanly blocks his driving shot attempt.
Nembhard (IND) pushes Sengun (HOU) in the back, affecting his trajectory during his put-back shot attempt.
Sengun (HOU) briefly grasps and releases Smith's (IND) jersey when he controls the rebound.
Smith Jr. (HOU) has a resting hand on Smith's (IND) body during his shot attempt near the basket and the body contact that occurs is marginal.
Smith Jr. (HOU) initiates contact with Nesmith's (IND) arm that affects his shot attempt near the basket.
Siakam (IND) cleanly deflects the loose ball from Smith Jr. (HOU) during the rebound.

As Thompson (HOU) attempts to pursue the loose ball, he makes incidental contact with Haliburton's (IND) lower body as both players come together. Houston is then granted a timeout when Thompson has control of the ball.
Smith (IND) legally contests Green's (HOU) jump shot, making "high-five" contact after the ball is released.
Thompson (HOU) moves laterally into Haliburton's (IND) path and initiates contact to his body that affects Haliburton's driving shot attempt.
